channel.title: Google Developers Galway Meetup on Lynda O'Leary
channel.description: Recent content in Google Developers Galway Meetup on Lynda O'Leary

item.title: Speaking
item.description: Are you all about ensuring that there are no manual or mundane tasks done by humans? As a DevOps engineer, to focus just on coding/developing the application while everything else happens automatically in the background, including continuous integration, continuous deployment to staging, rules based promotion to dev, stage, alpha, beta and production environment. You will build, scale, automate and maintain a number of infrastructure projects including but not limited to - monitoring and alerting, automated deployments (cloud and on premise), software defined
